values.value: FedRAMP SI-4 (System Monitoring) requires continuous monitoring of information systems to detect attacks, indicators of attacks, and unauthorized system connections. Monitoring must include real-time alerts and automated response capabilities.
FedRAMP Moderate Baseline SI-4 - System Monitoring, SI-7 - Software Integrity

1. Enable Event Monitoring (Shield) for comprehensive system monitoring. 2. Configure real-time alerts for security-relevant events (failed logins, privilege changes, data access). 3. Implement automated response for critical security events. 4. Review monitoring logs daily and investigate anomalies. 5. Document monitoring procedures and alert thresholds. 6. Maintain monitoring evidence for continuous monitoring reporting.
